meanings.sent1: The downcomes of the roller coaster made my stomach drop.
meanings.sent2: The airplane's downcomes during landing were smooth and gentle.
meanings.sent3: The downcomes of the elevator were so fast, it felt like a free fall!
meanings.sent4: The downcomes of the waterfall created a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The downcomes of the mountain path were treacherous and steep.

meanings.sent1: He realized the downcomes of his actions when he lost his job.
meanings.sent2: The downcomes of skipping class were detention and missed learning.
meanings.sent3: The downcomes of eating too much candy were a stomach ache and regret.
meanings.sent4: The downcomes of the storm were flooded streets and power outages.
meanings.sent5: The downcomes of not studying for the test were a failing grade and disappointment.
